sentence.Network_en: He was wearing, astonishingly, a frilly pink apron over shirt and trousers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他穿得很奇怪，衬衫和裤子外面套着件镶褶边的粉红围裙。

sentence.Network_en: The most desirable properties necessarily command astonishingly high prices.
sentence.Network_cn: 最值得拥有的财产必然要价不菲。

sentence.Network_en: During the Seventies, Rundgren was astonishingly prolific.
sentence.Network_cn: 20世纪70年代，伦德格伦的作品多得惊人。

list.abs: and it will seem an astonishingly short time to look back upon when are past ., 它们很快就会过去的 , 过去以后再回首往日 , 它似乎短得惊人.
despite his astonishingly rapid recovery his family are besieged by anxiety as he prepares to return next year to the grid .虽然他的恢复速度惊人，但他的家人却被他想在明年回到赛道的计划而陷入焦虑中。
Yet rates sexual crime are astonishingly low ., 但是性犯罪率出奇地低.
Influenza viruses are also astonishingly mutable ., 流感病毒也惊人地变化无常.

entry.tran: 令人惊讶的；非常惊人的
entry.def: Something that is astonishing is very surprising.

example.ex: It's astonishing, he's learned Latin in three hours!
example.tran: 他花了3个小时就学会了拉丁文，真让人吃惊！

means.word_mean: 1. in an amazing manner; to everyone's surprise;

sentences.sentence: "amazingly, he finished medical school in three years"
